description: Users are experiencing missing key features in Outlook, particularly when using a 365 Exchange-based email account. Specific features like custom forms and COM add-ins are not functional or visible, significantly impacting user experience and productivity. Additionally, there is an issue where the application fails to display any contacts in the address book, creating another barrier to effective communication. This symptom is particularly pertinent for organizations that rely heavily on these features for daily operations. Admins should investigate affected environments to ensure proper configuration and functionality.
